FuncDef: This command specifies the format of the routable encapsulation to add to each copied packet. Layer 3 encapsulation takes precedence over Ethernet encapsulation configuration in an LI source. No changes are allowed to the Layer 3 encapsulation after a gateway is configured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the type of Layer 3 encapsulation is an IPv4 header, UDP header, and LI-Shim.
